channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Download Attachments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Download Attachments

item.title: CVE-2023-0076|2024-08-02T04:54:32.616Z -- unknown -- download%20attachments
item.description: The Download Attachments WordPress plugin before 1.3 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
